scripts.start-prod-server: cd server && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.start-prod-docker-server: cd server && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.install-prod: cd server && npm install --production && cd ../client && npm install --production
scripts.start: npm run install && npm run build-client && npm run copy && npm run start-prod-server
scripts.start-docker: npm run install-prod && npm run build-client && npm run copy && npm run start-prod-docker-server
